name: automem
description: Give Claude persistent memory across conversations. Store decisions, patterns, and context that persist forever.
long_description:
AutoMem gives Claude a real memory system using graph + vector databases. Your AI assistant can now:
- **Remember everything** - Decisions, preferences, and project context persist across all sessions
- **Build knowledge graphs** - Connect related memories for richer context
- **Search semantically** - Find relevant memories by meaning, not just keywords
- **Learn your style** - Store corrections and preferences so Claude adapts to you
Requires an AutoMem backend (self-hosted or Railway deployment).

tools.name: store_memory
tools.description: Store a memory with content, tags, importance, and metadata

tools.name: recall_memory
tools.description: Search memories using hybrid vector + keyword + tag matching

tools.name: associate_memories
tools.description: Create typed relationships between memories (RELATES_TO, LEADS_TO, etc.)

tools.name: update_memory
tools.description: Update an existing memory's content, tags, or importance

tools.name: delete_memory
tools.description: Permanently delete a memory and its embedding

tools.name: check_database_health
tools.description: Check connection status of FalkorDB and Qdrant databases
